CONTENT: ちょうど1年前の 入学式の日
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Justo hace un año tuvimos la ceremonia de apertura...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Just about a year ago when we had our entrance ceremony...

CONTENT: 掲示板に クラス分けの紙が張り出され
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Las listas de clase se encontraban en los tablones de notas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Our class assignments were stuck to the bulletin boards.

CONTENT: 大勢の新入生が 集まっている中
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Entre la multitud de nuevos estudiantes,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And among the crowd of new students,

CONTENT: 自分と同じように　人混みから 距離を置いている女子がいた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: había una chica que se mantenía alejada de la gente, igual que yo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: there was one other girl keeping her distance from the crowd, just like myself.

CONTENT: そのとき 目が合った相手こそ しまむらだった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La chica con la que crucé la mirada entonces resultaba ser Shimamura.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The girl who exchanged glances with me then just happened to be Shimamura.

CONTENT: もちろん そのときの私は　他人というものに 全く興味がなくて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por supuesto, por aquel entonces no me interesaban los desconocidos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Of course, back then, I had absolutely no interest in strangers.

CONTENT: こっち見ないでよ とすら 思っていた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Incluso deseaba que me dejara de mirar.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I even hoped that she'd stop looking at me.

CONTENT: あれから1年がたち　私も しまむらも 2年生になった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Después de un año, Shimamura y yo ya estamos en segundo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A year had passed, and now, Shimamura and I were both second-years.

CONTENT: この世界に 神様はいるだろうか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Does God actually exist?

CONTENT: 私の声なき祈りを聞き届ける 何かはいるだろうか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Habrá algo que escuche mis plegarias silenciosas?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Was there something that could hear my voiceless prayer?

CONTENT: また一緒か 何年目だっけ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Otra vez en la misma clase. ¿Cuántos años van ya?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We're in the same class again. How many years has it been now?

CONTENT: 10年くらい? 他は結構バラけちゃったねえ　しまむらとか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Unos diez? Parece que han separado a todo el mundo, como a Shimamura.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: About ten? Looks like almost everyone else got split up. Like Shimamura.

CONTENT: もし 教室が別々になったら
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If we end up in separate classes,

CONTENT: しまむらは わざわざ 私に会おうとしないだろう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: seguramente Shimamura no vendría a verme.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura probably wouldn't come to see me.

CONTENT: 会いに行けば 拒まないだろうけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No le importaría si fuera yo a verla, pero...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She probably wouldn't mind if I came to see her, but...

CONTENT: でも 自分からは動かない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But she wouldn't come to see me.

CONTENT: しまむらが そこまで　私を必要としているとは 思わないから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No creo que Shimamura me necesite tanto.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Because I don't think Shimamura actually needs me that badly.

CONTENT: 自分は決して 褒められるような 出来のいい人間ではない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Definitivamente no me merezco ningún halago.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm definitely not a decent person worth any praise.

CONTENT: 求めたものが与えられるよう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I can't imagine that I've done

CONTENT: それに見合ったものを 積み重ねてきたとも思えない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: para que se me recompense con lo que he pedido.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: enough good deeds to be rewarded with anything I ask for.

CONTENT: だけど この世界に神様はいるだろうか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But... Does God actually exist?

CONTENT: 私の声なき祈りを聞き届ける 何かはいるだろうか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Ha habido algo que ha escuchado mis plegarias?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Was there something that could hear my voiceless prayer?

CONTENT: 私は願う 私は求める
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I wish and I hope...

CONTENT: 背を伸ばし その名前を...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I stand tall, searching for that name...

CONTENT: やったー! わーい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes! Yippee!

CONTENT: アハハ... やったー わーい わーい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes! Yippee! Yippee!

CONTENT: やったー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes!

CONTENT: 2年生になって 私は髪の毛を元の色に戻した
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Empecé segundo y mi pelo volvió a su color natural.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I started my second year in high school and my hair color went back to its natural color.

CONTENT: 新しいクラスでは
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: In my new class,

CONTENT: 同級生も席順も替わったが
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: mi sitio y el de la mayoría habían cambiado,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: my seat and most of my classmates had changed,

CONTENT: 安達だけは いつもと変わらず 私の目の前にいてくれる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero Adachi seguía justo delante de mí.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but Adachi still remained right in front of me.

CONTENT: 安達の名前って 桜なんだ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So your first name is Sakura?

CONTENT: うん 前にも聞いたかな?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah. Did I ever ask you that before?

CONTENT: えっ... あっ 多分
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? Um, I think so.

CONTENT: へえー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh...?

CONTENT: 桜ちゃん えっ!?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sakura. Huh?!

CONTENT: それとも 桜さん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Or do you prefer Miss Sakura?

CONTENT: どうした? 安達 えっと...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What's wrong, Adachi? Um...

CONTENT: べ... 別にその...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-It's nothing...

CONTENT: ふーん あっ　あ... いや その な... 何?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Er, I mean... Wait, what?

CONTENT: 何でもない 安達を見てただけ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nothing. I was just looking at you.

CONTENT: そ... そう 私を
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: O-Oh... You were looking at me.

CONTENT: 安達 何で ついてきてるの?　えっ? あの その...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Adachi, ¿por qué me estás siguiendo? Bueno, es que...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi... Why are you following me? Well, I...

CONTENT: だって 自転車 あっ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What about your bike?

CONTENT: そ... そっちか プッ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: O-Oh, that's what you meant.

CONTENT: アハハハハ...し... しまむら?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sh-Shimamura?

CONTENT: 安達って時々 犬っぽい顔になるね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You look so much like a puppy sometimes.

CONTENT: ふぇ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh?

CONTENT: ワン
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Woof.

CONTENT: いや 全然 そう?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I do not. Are you sure?

CONTENT: じ... 自転車取ってくる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-I'll go get my bike.

CONTENT: 私は結構 犬とか好きなんだけどなあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Aunque la verdad es que me gustan los perros.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I actually like dogs quite a bit, though.

CONTENT: 相変わらず おっきい家だなあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Nunca me acostumbraré a lo grande que es su casa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I will never get over how big her house is.

CONTENT: ゴロゴロ ゴロゴロ ゴロゴロ ゴロゴロ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Gira, gira, gira... Gira, gira, gira...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Roll, roll, roll, roll, roll, roll...

CONTENT: 楽しいか?　畳のニオイが ことのほか うん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Te diviertes? El olor del tatami es tan...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You having fun? The smell of the tatami is just so...

CONTENT: 言われたとおり 着替えてやったぞ　これでいいんだろ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me he cambiado como me habías pedido. Era lo que querías, ¿no?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I changed, just like you asked. This is what you wanted, right?

CONTENT: おーっ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ooh.

CONTENT: うん? うん?　お... おい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Uh, hey?

CONTENT: 日野 かわいいな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're so cute, Hino.

CONTENT: な... 何だ いきなり
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wh-Where'd that come from?

CONTENT: 見てて そう思った お前ねえ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me ha salido del alma. En serio...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That was the first thought to cross my mind. Seriously...

CONTENT: さて 私も着替えよっかな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Venga, yo también voy a cambiarme.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Now, then. I guess I'll get changed, too.

CONTENT: ああ? 着替え?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wait. Changed?

CONTENT: 今日は 日野の家に泊まるつもりなのね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Había planeado pasar la noche en tu casa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I was planning to spend the night at your place today.

CONTENT: はっ? 泊まる?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What? Spend the night?

CONTENT: 家 大きいし 私が紛れてても 気づかないな　うん うん お前なー 先に言っとけよなー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Bueno, tu casa es tan grande que supuse que nadie se daría cuenta si me quedo. Vaya tela... Deberías haberme preguntado antes.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, your place is huge, so I figured no one would notice even if I stayed over. Yup. Seriously... You should've asked me first.

CONTENT: 言ったら反対するし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, you'd object if I did.

CONTENT: よく分かってんじゃねえかでしょー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So you do know me. I sure do.

CONTENT: 晶 ちょっといい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Akira, do you have a moment?

CONTENT: あら ええっと たえさん だったわよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, you're Tae, aren't you?

CONTENT: そうです そうですいや お前 妙子だろ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí, así es. No, te llamas Taeko.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes, I sure am. Er, your name is Taeko.

CONTENT: で 何?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What did you need?

CONTENT: 着替えているのなら ちょうどいいわ　あなたも お客様に ご挨拶を
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me alegro de que te hayas cambiado. Ven a saludar a nuestros invitados.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm glad you're already changed. Please come greet our guests.

CONTENT: ええー 私も関係あるの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Qué? ¿Por qué tengo que saludarlos yo también?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What? Why do I have to greet them, too?

CONTENT: あなたも この家の子供でしょう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tú también eres parte de esta familia.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, you're a part of this family.

CONTENT: あっそ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Okay, fine.

CONTENT: あーあ こういうのがあるから 早く帰りたくないんだよなあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Y por eso odio llegar a casa tan temprano.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And this is exactly why I hate coming home early.

CONTENT: しまむらさん だよね? うん そう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're Shimamura, right? Yeah, I am.

CONTENT: よかったらさあ 私達と一緒に お昼食べない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Great. Hey, wanna have lunch with us?

CONTENT: えっ? あ... その...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? I, uh...

CONTENT: 約束とかある?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Do you have plans?

CONTENT: えっと それはないけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? No, but...

CONTENT: だったらいいじゃん 私達の席で一緒に
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Then, come on. Come sit with us.

CONTENT: じゃ... じゃあ イエーイ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: O-Okay, I guess? Yay!

CONTENT: ど... どうも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Th-Thanks...?

CONTENT: じゃあ こっち来て しまむらさん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Come this way, Shimamura.

CONTENT: あっ うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Uh, okay.

CONTENT: あっ 私 お弁当じゃないから　買ってくるね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ah, hoy no he traído comida, así que voy a comprar algo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, I didn't bring my lunch, so I'm going to go buy something.

CONTENT: えっ? えっ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh?

CONTENT: 安達...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi...

CONTENT: みんな 前から仲いいの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So have you guys been friends for a while?

CONTENT: ううん 2年生になってから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No, solo llevamos un año juntas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nah, just since this year.

CONTENT: そっかあ しまむらさん　部活とかやってるの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya veo... ¿Estás en algún club, Shimamura?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I see... Are you in any clubs, Shimamura?

CONTENT: ううん まったくだよ えー 意外
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No, en ninguno. Vaya, qué sorpresa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nope, not at all. Wow, what a surprise.

CONTENT: 私は一応 軽音部
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: En la banda no somos muchos...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm in concert band. The number of members is a bit iffy.

CONTENT: 3人は すぐに 自己紹介してきたけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They all introduced themselves,

CONTENT: 早口で聞き取れなかった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero hablan tan rápido que no las he entendido.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but they talked too fast and I couldn't understand them.

CONTENT: 確か パンチョ サンチョ デロス　みたいな流れだったと思う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Creo que se llamaban algo así como Pancho, Sancho y Delos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I think it was something like Pancho, Sancho, and Delos.

CONTENT: さては どこぞの旅芸人一座だな なんて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Creía que tenían nombre de grupo cómico.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I figured they must be some kind of traveling comedy troupe. JK.

CONTENT: そんな名前のはずはない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There's no way that those were actually their names.

CONTENT: そのあとも 他愛もない話が続いたが
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Después, la charla superficial continuó, pero...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And then, their idle chatter continued, but...

CONTENT: 正直 思い返してみても
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: To be honest,

CONTENT: 何を話していたか 覚えていなかった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: intenté recordar de qué hablaban, pero no pude.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I tried to remember what they were talking about, but just couldn't.

CONTENT: しまむらさん 私達これから 駅前のカフェに行くんだけど　一緒にどう? えっ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Oye, Shimamura. Vamos a la cafetería de al lado de la estación, ¿te apuntas?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Say, Shimamura. We're going to the café by the station now. Want to come with us? Huh?

CONTENT: とっても パンケーキがおいしいのよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Their pancakes are super yummy.

CONTENT: 店の感じも すごくいいの ねえー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es un local muy pequeñito. ¿A que sí?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's such a cute little shop. Right?

CONTENT: どう? あっ えっと　今日は ちょっと...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Qué dices? A ver, lo siento, hoy no puedo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What do you say? Yeah, uh... Sorry, I can't today.

CONTENT: クラスが替わって 日野と永藤もいなくなって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Cambiaron los grupos y Hino y Nagafuji ya no estaban,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Our classes changed and now that Hino and Nagafuji were gone,

CONTENT: 新しい友人もどきが生まれた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I've made new artificial friends.

CONTENT: まあ 日野と永藤は 面白いヤツだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por lo menos, Hino y Nagafuji eran entretenidas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I mean, Hino and Nagafuji were at least entertaining.

CONTENT: クラスが替わったら　積極的に遊ぶほどの仲でも ないと思う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero no éramos tan íntimas como para salir con ellas ahora que estamos en clases distintas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But we weren't so close I'd go out of my way to hang out with them now that our classes were different.

CONTENT: こう振り返ってみると 私は継続しない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ahora que lo pienso, no suelo mantener contacto con la gente.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Now that I think about it, I don't keep up with people.

CONTENT: 人間関係を ほとんど持ち越さない　薄情なヤツなのかもしれない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Como no mantengo las relaciones, me hace parecer fría.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't really hold onto relationships and that might make me coldhearted.

CONTENT: けど 私はこう考える
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero yo lo veo de otra forma.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But here's how I see it.

CONTENT: どこまでも 共に流れていくほど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There are so very few strong relationships

CONTENT: 強い関係は めったにない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: que fluyan contigo en el río de la vida.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: that flow along with you down this river of life.

CONTENT: 運命の川に長く浸れば
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Cuanto más te quedas en el río del destino,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: \"When should I return the notes I borrowed?\" \"The next time we see each other is fine.\" \"Thanks.\" \"I haven't seen...\" The longer you stay in this river of fate,

CONTENT: 絆もふやけて ちぎれてゆくものだと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: más lazos se debilitan y se acaban rompiendo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: the more bonds weaken, and eventually break.

CONTENT: 安達が 教室に姿を見せなくなったのは
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Adachi dejó de ir a clase
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi stopped showing up to class

CONTENT: 休日明けの月曜日からだった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: el lunes después del fin de semana.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: the following Monday after the weekend.

CONTENT: のぞきに行くべきか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Should I go have a peek?

CONTENT: 安達も ひょっとしたら それを待っているかもしれないし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Quizás es lo que esté esperando.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Maybe that's what Adachi's waiting for.

CONTENT: でも 下手に見に行って 先生に気づかれたりしたら
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero si subo y algún profe nos pilla...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But if I go up there and a teacher spots us...

CONTENT: そういえばさ しまむらさんって 安達さんと仲いいの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por cierto, ¿eres muy amiga de Adachi?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: By the way, are you close with Adachi?

CONTENT: う... うん 一応 友達だけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Y-Yeah, she's my friend.

CONTENT: だよねえ 去年 結構話しているの見たし　今日は風邪? さあ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya me lo parecía. El año pasado ibais juntas todo el rato. ¿Hoy está enferma? No estoy segura...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I figured. I saw you two talking all the time last year. Is she sick today? I'm not sure...

CONTENT: 私さ 安達さんと同中だったけど　何か雰囲気変わったよね そうなの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Yo fui a secundaria con Adachi, pero ha cambiado mucho. ¿Ah, sí?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So I went to the same middle school as Adachi, but she's totally changed. Really?

CONTENT: うん 教室で 誰とも話さないのは同じだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí. Bueno, todavía no se relaciona con nadie en clase,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah. I mean, she still didn't talk to anyone in class,

CONTENT: 何か こう もっと硬い感じだった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero antes parecía que más reservada.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but she seemed even more guarded.

CONTENT: 今も 似たようなもんだと思うよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No estoy segura de que haya cambiado en eso.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm not sure if any of that has changed.

CONTENT: いやー 何か違うかな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nah, there's something different.

CONTENT: もっと 平和のインテリジェンスを感じないような...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She doesn't feel so... standoffish.

CONTENT: 要するに トゲトゲしくないということかな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: En otras palabras, ya no se enfada tanto.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: In other words, she doesn't seem so prickly anymore.

CONTENT: 少なくとも 私の接するところの安達は
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Al menos, cuando interactúo con ella
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: At least, when I interact with Adachi,
